original_text: Instead, the king took Saul's two sons, Armoni and Mephibosheth. Aiah's daughter Rizpah was their mother. He also took the five sons of Saul's daughter Merab. Adriel, the son of Barzillai from Meholath, was their father.
korean_text: 왕이 이에 아야의 딸 리스바에게서 난 자 곧 사울의 두 아들 알모니와 므비보셋과 사울의 딸 메랍에게서 난 자 곧 므홀랏 사람 바르실래의 아들 아드리엘의 다섯 아들을 붙잡아

sentences.original_text: Instead, the king took Saul's two sons
sentences.korean_translation: 대신에 왕은 사울의 두 아들을 데려갔습니다

sentences.original_text: Aiah's daughter Rizpah was their mother
He also took the five sons
Adriel, the son of Barzillai from Meholath
